data.what_is:
eTrigue is a next-generation thru-marketing service. Our mission is to make partner marketing frictionless--through platform, expert team, and content integration. We run your digital campaigns on our platform so that you can realize partner marketing value faster and better.
 
eTrigue is the only partner marketing service with a partner specific platform designed to run partner digital marketing campaigns--on your behalf. With real-time lead alerts for you and your partners, and performance dashboards, you can track every MQL and sales person follow-up.
data.product_description: eTrigue provides easy-to-use demand generation capabilities. features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 17 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 12 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 14 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 16 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 15 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 10 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 29 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 28 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 28 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 23 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 27 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 20 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 15 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 15 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Based on 18 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 28 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 26 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 26 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 18 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 28 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 22 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 25 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Based on 20 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 23 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Based on 22 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Based on 12 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 29 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 23 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 17 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 11 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Based on 11 eTrigue reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best Bang For The Buck.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
DemandCenter from Etrigue is very easy to use, and yet is as full-featured as anyone needs for marketing automation, including lead generation, lead nurturing, subscription management, webinar registrations and follow-up, and more.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
It's a hosted application that's running a lot of data. Most of the time there are no connectivity or performance issues, but the application does periodically lag or inexplicably time-out.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
The main things to look at in considering a marketing automation tool are: ease of use, functionality, cost, and quality of customer service. The first three items are easy enough to compare as a prospect. The last one you don't know about until you buy and become a customer. The eTrigue customer support team is super responsive and always helpful.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use i primarily for ongoing customer communications -- upsell, cross-sell, renewals, retention newsletters and the like -- as well as ongoing lead generation and lead nurturing.

initial_reviews.review_title: Marketing Automation at it's best
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
It's hard to pick a favorite feature. The ease of building assets and campaigns is great. But then the downstream analytics and insights into how your specific prospects and customers are interacting with your emails and your web site are invaluable. The team at etrigue is super helpful as well. If I ever have an issue or get stuck on something they are on it.  I think every marketing team should be on this platform.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
I understand why but I wish onboarding was a little quicker. Expectations these days are that everything is plug and play. The process is worth it here though. If you are a marketer that doesn't understand the IT side of the onboarding you will need to engage a partner/vendor to help you (i.e. if you don't know how to setup a subdomain or an SSL cert you'll need help).

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
Use your account support team they provide so much help and guidance if you're feeling stuck.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
We succeed in Lead Gen, customer nuturing, and communications analytics.

initial_reviews.review_title: Marketing Automation that Makes Sense
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
DemandCenter by eTrigue offers flexibility that is non-existent in other MAP systems. From the incredibly easy to use email and Landing Page templates to the form builder, eTrigue has constructed a "wunderkind" of an MA system to be used by everyone who seeks to learn marketing automation in both theory and in execution.
One of the things that makes eTrigue so successful is their customer support. It's simply what tech support was 40 years ago......responsive and of high quality/value. The eTrigue support team gets all over issues without delay and they give you a resolution same day or an ETA for a fix, or an immediate work around. They do not pretend that it's a perfect world/product and that approach is refreshing. Without that level of support we couldn't be successful. It's quite an achievement.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
While the reporting is extensive I would like to see some more packaged reports that can give me a quicker summary of where I am in a campaign. Currently I have to look at several reports and I would like the ability to gen up ad hoc reporting easier than I can currently. Having just written that, in fairness to eTrigue, because of our heavy use for multiple clients, our reporting requirements are a bit different.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
Check out VisitIQ from eTrigue as well as SalesPro. Don't miss out purchasing these two products as they help involve the sales team in the MAP. (marketing automation platform)

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
Demand Generation is the business problem that we solve. Without eTrigue we could not be as successful as we've been. No question.

initial_reviews.review_title: Easy to Use for a Small User Base for a Small to Mid size Company
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
I loved how easy it was to make lists and keep the lists consistent. I didn't have to go in every time to pull a new list to email the same people. I could be consistent with my address & not have to worry if they were right or not.
The email templates were easy to use & fun to work with. The hard-coded areas were not limiting and were over all, user friendly.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
I didn't like how limited it was compare to other on metrics and reviews and performance metrics. We also had SEVERAL email address that were not "deduplicated" so they would get the same email several times, that was horrible for us & we had to do a lot of manual clean up.
Support was limited, and very unprofessional.
We were told that eTrigue integrated with Microsoft Dynamics CRM, which i guess in a way, it did, but it did HORRIBLY. Almost broke our CRM, just wasn't a good experience and should not have been recommended to us.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
When starting out with a marketing automation system, eTrigue is a great tool for "putting your toes in the water" versus "jumping in with both feet". It is limited in its ability for certain features such as metrics and flexibility on email template looks, BUT when you are a new company new to marketing, this tool isnt too overwhelming and will be benefit your lead gen quality as it did ours. We would have stayed with eTrigue but our user base and lead gen grew to 50,000+ and we needed a marketing system that integrated with our current CRM.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
With the real time lead alerts, we could pick up the phone and call people who were on our site the same day. That was huge for us & helped convert cold leads to warm.

initial_reviews.review_title: B2B Marketing Automation Simplified
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
eTrigue is built only for B2B business so they truly understand the differences with business-to-business marketing. We had Marketo previously, and the first change was that while Marketo takes hours of in-depth online training or offsite seminars, eTrigue was simple to learn and we were up and running within a couple days. The interface is so simple - yet robust. The way that email campaign assets, lists, forms and alerts are all each under their own tabs makes it very clean and easy to look at. Building a campaign is super simple. It takes logic, of course, and we hit a few snags when we first started, but the Help team always figured it out and got back to us within 24 hours, usually only one or two hours. Marketo often wouldn't get back to us for days. With customizable reports, an easy form-building tool, and lots of integrations with other programs - we love working with eTrigue. Designing emails is also a snap for our marketing team, without any major programming knowledge needed.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
The lead scoring is a little less customizable than Marketo because we can't combine the demographic score and campaign scores. So we are still tweaking our lead alert settings.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
If you are B2B I would highly consider eTrigue for marketing automation needs. Find out in advance from any other competitor products how long it takes to train to learn the product. eTrigue outshined in that way. And it was affordable for our relatively small budget. Lots of products also say they integrate with other software, but then you have to pay to have the integration built.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed a marketing automation system that was easy to use, helped us build forms, landing pages, email campaigns and provided real-time lead alerts. We are a B2B unit working within a B2C company and we needed something that fit our needs better. eTrigue has helped bring our sales and marketing in alignment by letting us all use the system as we need it, and now marketing automation is simple for our small marketing team.

initial_reviews.review_title: We use eTrigue's DemandCenter for B2B almost daily, for 5 years - and it's great!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
This is the perfect tool for those that like ultimate freedom/flexibility when designing their marketing automation (MA).  eTrigue's "DemandCenter" application keeps up with all of the best MA tools out there, but has a few key features and speedy interface that make me recommend it above others, if you value your time.

Specifically, the UI is not a 'wizard/guided/steps' kind of approach. Instead, you have all of the options/criteria/actions available to you, and you can speedily compile lists and campaigns. So once you know where everything is, you can really hum along without constant interruptions or multiple screens of setup.

The same UI components (for the list building criteria, for example) is the same/consistent in other parts of the application.  Like the reports builder or criteria for actions/triggers within campaigns.  So once you've learned it in one location, it is intuitive to use in other areas.

Data/contacts visibility and hygiene also seems easy, due to this setup.  You can quickly review your database, applying filters for drilled-down views.  Wildcards and boolean functionality available throughout to be able to see what you really want to see.

But, above all else, eTrigue has the best support I've ever experienced for a SaaS / online app.  They're very responsive to tickets, open to new features, and it's always the same group of people that I'm dealing with.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
Initially, I was frustrated with DemandCenter's first take at enhanced reporting.  Not being familiar with standard report designing, I found the flexibility overwhelming.  They've since re-vamped their entire reporting system, and it seems much more straight forward now - though, limiting.  I'm still not quite sure they've struck the perfect balance, but they sure are trying.

I'll list out an industry standard 'dislike', but it's something I actually appreciate. DemandCenter's flow and UI design seems to boil down to speed, rather than guided walkthroughs and validation. Meaning, the system is flexible and doesn't stop you from performing invalid or mismatched actions. Sure, there are validation and testing mechanisms to test your final product, but it's not going to baby you through the setup or interrupt you with dialogs or page refreshes.  Likewise, with the database setup and segmentation, you will need to know what you want and how you want to segment - because the system isn't going to walk you through it.  You have ultimate control over custom fields, and how those fields play into campaign triggers, or list building.  There's no boilerplate setup.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
Know what you want. Know what web assets (forms, landings, and offerings such as eBooks) you have available to you.  Know how your sales division works, and how lead assignment is handled.  Know your starting data/contacts, and how you would like it organized/segmented.  Know all of this before starting - even if you are planning on getting help via implementation services.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
Huge ROI with the reduced man-hours required for this level of marketing automation.

The way DemandCenter has alerts set up is a huge bonus - though mostly a boon to the Sales department, and not so much marketing.  This tool perfectly blends both Sales and Marketing functionality.

Last note: we're a software company that relies on trial downloads for lead generation. With the sheer volume, it would be easy to let leads slip through the cracks. But with DemandCenter, and tight use of automated campaigns, nothing slips through - all notifications go off as expected, automated nurturing keeps crunching away, and lead alerts/notifications keep firing off to the assigned rep.  It's like a well-oiled machine - thanks to the flexibility and reliability of eTrigue.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
It's packed with features. It seems like anytime you use it, you are always finding something new to tools to leverage to really take my campaigns up a few levels.

eTrigue DemandCenter is easier to use than most other marketing automation tools I've previously used.

The support team is great. Anytime I contacted them, they were extremely helpful, responsive and enjoyable to work with.


What do you dislike about eTrigue?
It can take some extra time to learn if you really want to dive into how granular you can get with some of the features.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
I highly recommend it. eTrigue has been an invaluable tool for my B2B campaigns. It is the easiest to use Marketing Automation tool I have used yet. Not to mention, their support staff and learning resources were extremely helpful in getting up to speed quickly. The are great company to work with on all fronts!

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helping create segmented and qualified leads to fill the sales pipeline for B2B marketing programs. The real-time alerts are an unbelievable tool to help with sales teams jump to action quickly. In addition, being able to track all the prospect detail and reporting is extremely valuable when creating campaigns and appropriate messaging for each audience.

initial_reviews.review_title: eTrigue DemandCenter helps us launch campaigns quickly, with less people and minimal training needed
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
eTrigue Demand Center is very easy to use. To setup a campaign you just drag the action items to the dashboard, and rearrange the order if you change your mind. We can usually teach a new hire how to competently use eTrigue within a few hours. And they can setup their own campaign the same day. The support team calls us back within an hour or so, and guides us through setting up more complex campaigns when we have questions. We can build landing pages in the eTrigue editor or in other tools and just import it.

eTrigue is quick to master, and very flexible for more complex campaigns. The ROI reporting is pretty cool, and gives us data even if our sales team does not.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
I dont have any complaints. The previous reporting was harder to use, though the new reporting is very fast, has time based measurements for comparison, and has some pretty advanced features that are easy to test theories, and change campaign messaging based on results.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
They genuinely care about our success. The support team is available by phone, and does not charge for premium support. We are able to get a new account setup within 2 - 4 days, and are running campaigns within a week. We have seen new features released regularly, and are excited about some new functionality being added. I recommend for anyone that wants to generate results quickly and needs to add people to their team and ramp up without requiring lots of training.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
We paid for eTrigue 5x with our first deal a week after implementing. The ROI is very high. We can have new employees setting up campaigns and running in their first week. We launch about 3 campaigns per week, and dont need a dedicated team. We can usually setup a landing page, email, and follow on assets within a couple hours. Then test the campaign and have it live within 20 minutes. One thing that has helped us tremenously is that we dont have to create all of the emails and asssets before we start a campaign. With other tools we had to create all of the assets first, before we could build the campaign. In eTrigue, we can create the who campaign flow, and add assets as they are completed. We can even start the campaign when only the first asset is completed. This enables us to launch campaigns sooner and not lose time waiting for the asset to be completed. Obviously this has been created by marketing people who know that customers change their minds yet the deadline remains the same.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
This is our second time around with marketing automation and eTrigue made it much easier. We got it running in the first week instead of the weeks it took before. If you understand the concepts behind marketing and a clear idea of your goals, you can get some serious campaigns and lead flow going quickly.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
Forms take a few steps to get them to look and work like our website. Having a good web guy definitely helps.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
Have a competent web coder around when you are setting up the forms and links onto your website.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
Drive more visits to our website and capture enough information about visitors to bring them into the sales process.  We have a much better idea of what's working in marketing and we know if sales is following up every lead.

initial_reviews.review_title: eTrigue Demand Center delivers the leads to ramp revenue.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
For CRM systems, there are 5 key "must haves" for cost-effective lead generation:

1) Fast and well supported implementation and training. Time to effective operation, 2 weeks maximum

2) Excellent customer service and responsiveness to client requests. The eTrigue support staff are knowledgeable and available to assure client success.

3) Intuitive operation.  eTrigue Demand Center is a robust product spawned from detailed marketing requirements and field tested for many years across companies of all sizes.

4) Robust feature set. Demand Center was not conceived in a developers head but rather it has evolved by market use and demand; thus it fits the real-life needs of the marketing department objectives.

5) Annual return-on-investment within the initial 90 days of operation. Investment small or large in marketing systems must clearly demonstrate a near term ROI. My measure is annual cost must be realized with the first 90 days of operation. Demand Center delivers this ROI.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
In the past, eTrigue Demand Center was not available in a version well suited to small business budgets.  However, this is no longer true.   In fact, I have implemented Demand Center in a number of small client companies who are now reaping the benefits that mid through Enterprise companies have enjoyed for years.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
It is a great product and stands above the competition.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a marketing and business consultant it is my responsibility to work with companies to realize optimal operational and ROI benefit from their marketing and sales (CRM, SFA, etc.) system selections.   Frequently, the client's primary objective is to  implement and ramp lead generation to drive revenue growth.  I have worked with a variety of the CRM systems in the market and, over the years, I have honed my list of "must haves" for any system I recommend to a client.  (see my "must haves" list).

It is critical to my reputation as a consultant that my clients are successful using the systems that I recommend.  I can bet on success and client satisfaction with eTrigue

initial_reviews.review_title: eTrigue is the best marketing automation tool available
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
Email campaigns are now easy. We have several newsletter and event campaigns setup that we modify (add to - in the case of newsletters) or clone (for webinars). We don't have to start from scratch each time, and can see the statistics (opens, visits, opt-outs..) for the campaign right in the campaign window.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
The alerts require that you build logic to narrow down specific search criteria for each alert, assign named users and set the conditions for each alert.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
Use Demand Center and stay away from the "all-in-one" marketing suites if you're looking for real marketing automation.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were not getting enough information from campaigns and we were not able to see how much time was spent on pages from our previous system.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
Ease of use and speed of implementation.  Excellent customer support if and when you need it.  The team found it very easy to get started due to its intuitive nature.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
Can't think of anything to dislike.  Definitely meets the needs of SMB's and divisions of large companies.  Haven't tried in the context of org wide implementation of a Fortune 100 company.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:

initial_reviews.review_content:

The tools are easy to use and it's easy to navigate the various functions once you know what is included in each heading. We have three campaigns running at the moment, and although it's early days to measure results due to the nature of our business and of the campaigns, we are extremely pleased with the way the campaigns are proceeding and in particular the monitoring functions available. Support in answering queries is fantastic - a very quick turnaround which is vital when new to a system.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
Online 'Support' is good, but as the system is complex it is difficult to work through at the outset and it's not always possible to find answers to queries online. However, the support desk response is fantastic (see above). If possible, a longer training phase would be good, particularly as I have been unaware of some of the exceptionally useful functionality until pointed there by the support desk - for example the statistics facility in campaigns.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using eTrigue for lead generation.

It's a hosted application that's running a lot of data. Most of the time there are no connectivity or performance issues, but the application does periodically lag or inexplicably time-out.

The first three items are easy enough to compare as a prospect. The last one you don't know about until you buy and become a customer. The eTrigue customer support team is super responsive and always helpful.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
DemandCenter by eTrigue offers flexibility that is non-existent in other MAP systems. From the incredibly easy to use email and Landing Page templates to the form builder, eTrigue has constructed a "wunderkind" of an MA system to be used by everyone who seeks to learn marketing automation in both theory and in execution.
One of the things that makes eTrigue so successful is their customer support. It's simply what tech support was 40 years ago......responsive and of high quality/value. The eTrigue support team gets all over issues without delay and they give you a resolution same day or an ETA for a fix, or an immediate work around. They do not pretend that it's a perfect world/product and that approach is refreshing. Without that level of support we couldn't be successful. It's quite an achievement.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
While the reporting is extensive I would like to see some more packaged reports that can give me a quicker summary of where I am in a campaign. Currently I have to look at several reports and I would like the ability to gen up ad hoc reporting easier than I can currently. Having just written that, in fairness to eTrigue, because of our heavy use for multiple clients, our reporting requirements are a bit different.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
Check out VisitIQ from eTrigue as well as SalesPro. Don't miss out purchasing these two products as they help involve the sales team in the MAP. (marketing automation platform)

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
Demand Generation is the business problem that we solve. Without eTrigue we could not be as successful as we've been. No question.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to Use for a Small User Base for a Small to Mid size Company
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
I loved how easy it was to make lists and keep the lists consistent. I didn't have to go in every time to pull a new list to email the same people. I could be consistent with my address & not have to worry if they were right or not.
The email templates were easy to use & fun to work with. The hard-coded areas were not limiting and were over all, user friendly.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
I didn't like how limited it was compare to other on metrics and reviews and performance metrics. We also had SEVERAL email address that were not "deduplicated" so they would get the same email several times, that was horrible for us & we had to do a lot of manual clean up.
Support was limited, and very unprofessional.
We were told that eTrigue integrated with Microsoft Dynamics CRM, which i guess in a way, it did, but it did HORRIBLY. Almost broke our CRM, just wasn't a good experience and should not have been recommended to us.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
When starting out with a marketing automation system, eTrigue is a great tool for "putting your toes in the water" versus "jumping in with both feet". It is limited in its ability for certain features such as metrics and flexibility on email template looks, BUT when you are a new company new to marketing, this tool isnt too overwhelming and will be benefit your lead gen quality as it did ours. We would have stayed with eTrigue but our user base and lead gen grew to 50,000+ and we needed a marketing system that integrated with our current CRM.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
With the real time lead alerts, we could pick up the phone and call people who were on our site the same day. That was huge for us & helped convert cold leads to warm.

eTrigue is built only for B2B business so they truly understand the differences with business-to-business marketing. We had Marketo previously, and the first change was that while Marketo takes hours of in-depth online training or offsite seminars, eTrigue was simple to learn and we were up and running within a couple days. The interface is so simple - yet robust. The way that email campaign assets, lists, forms and alerts are all each under their own tabs makes it very clean and easy to look at. Building a campaign is super simple. It takes logic, of course, and we hit a few snags when we first started, but the Help team always figured it out and got back to us within 24 hours, usually only one or two hours. Marketo often wouldn't get back to us for days. With customizable reports, an easy form-building tool, and lots of integrations with other programs - we love working with eTrigue. Designing emails is also a snap for our marketing team, without any major programming knowledge needed.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
The lead scoring is a little less customizable than Marketo because we can't combine the demographic score and campaign scores. So we are still tweaking our lead alert settings.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
If you are B2B I would highly consider eTrigue for marketing automation needs. Find out in advance from any other competitor products how long it takes to train to learn the product. eTrigue outshined in that way. And it was affordable for our relatively small budget. Lots of products also say they integrate with other software, but then you have to pay to have the integration built.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed a marketing automation system that was easy to use, helped us build forms, landing pages, email campaigns and provided real-time lead alerts. We are a B2B unit working within a B2C company and we needed something that fit our needs better. eTrigue has helped bring our sales and marketing in alignment by letting us all use the system as we need it, and now marketing automation is simple for our small marketing team.

all_reviews.review_title: We use eTrigue's DemandCenter for B2B almost daily, for 5 years - and it's great!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
This is the perfect tool for those that like ultimate freedom/flexibility when designing their marketing automation (MA).  eTrigue's "DemandCenter" application keeps up with all of the best MA tools out there, but has a few key features and speedy interface that make me recommend it above others, if you value your time.

Specifically, the UI is not a 'wizard/guided/steps' kind of approach. Instead, you have all of the options/criteria/actions available to you, and you can speedily compile lists and campaigns. So once you know where everything is, you can really hum along without constant interruptions or multiple screens of setup.

The same UI components (for the list building criteria, for example) is the same/consistent in other parts of the application.  Like the reports builder or criteria for actions/triggers within campaigns.  So once you've learned it in one location, it is intuitive to use in other areas.

Data/contacts visibility and hygiene also seems easy, due to this setup.  You can quickly review your database, applying filters for drilled-down views.  Wildcards and boolean functionality available throughout to be able to see what you really want to see.

But, above all else, eTrigue has the best support I've ever experienced for a SaaS / online app.  They're very responsive to tickets, open to new features, and it's always the same group of people that I'm dealing with.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
Initially, I was frustrated with DemandCenter's first take at enhanced reporting.  Not being familiar with standard report designing, I found the flexibility overwhelming.  They've since re-vamped their entire reporting system, and it seems much more straight forward now - though, limiting.  I'm still not quite sure they've struck the perfect balance, but they sure are trying.

I'll list out an industry standard 'dislike', but it's something I actually appreciate. DemandCenter's flow and UI design seems to boil down to speed, rather than guided walkthroughs and validation. Meaning, the system is flexible and doesn't stop you from performing invalid or mismatched actions. Sure, there are validation and testing mechanisms to test your final product, but it's not going to baby you through the setup or interrupt you with dialogs or page refreshes.  Likewise, with the database setup and segmentation, you will need to know what you want and how you want to segment - because the system isn't going to walk you through it.  You have ultimate control over custom fields, and how those fields play into campaign triggers, or list building.  There's no boilerplate setup.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
Know what you want. Know what web assets (forms, landings, and offerings such as eBooks) you have available to you.  Know how your sales division works, and how lead assignment is handled.  Know your starting data/contacts, and how you would like it organized/segmented.  Know all of this before starting - even if you are planning on getting help via implementation services.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
Huge ROI with the reduced man-hours required for this level of marketing automation.

The way DemandCenter has alerts set up is a huge bonus - though mostly a boon to the Sales department, and not so much marketing.  This tool perfectly blends both Sales and Marketing functionality.

Last note: we're a software company that relies on trial downloads for lead generation. With the sheer volume, it would be easy to let leads slip through the cracks. But with DemandCenter, and tight use of automated campaigns, nothing slips through - all notifications go off as expected, automated nurturing keeps crunching away, and lead alerts/notifications keep firing off to the assigned rep.  It's like a well-oiled machine - thanks to the flexibility and reliability of eTrigue.

It's packed with features. It seems like anytime you use it, you are always finding something new to tools to leverage to really take my campaigns up a few levels.

eTrigue DemandCenter is easier to use than most other marketing automation tools I've previously used.

The support team is great. Anytime I contacted them, they were extremely helpful, responsive and enjoyable to work with.

I highly recommend it. eTrigue has been an invaluable tool for my B2B campaigns. It is the easiest to use Marketing Automation tool I have used yet. Not to mention, their support staff and learning resources were extremely helpful in getting up to speed quickly. The are great company to work with on all fronts!

Helping create segmented and qualified leads to fill the sales pipeline for B2B marketing programs. The real-time alerts are an unbelievable tool to help with sales teams jump to action quickly. In addition, being able to track all the prospect detail and reporting is extremely valuable when creating campaigns and appropriate messaging for each audience.

all_reviews.review_title: eTrigue DemandCenter helps us launch campaigns quickly, with less people and minimal training needed
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
eTrigue Demand Center is very easy to use. To setup a campaign you just drag the action items to the dashboard, and rearrange the order if you change your mind. We can usually teach a new hire how to competently use eTrigue within a few hours. And they can setup their own campaign the same day. The support team calls us back within an hour or so, and guides us through setting up more complex campaigns when we have questions. We can build landing pages in the eTrigue editor or in other tools and just import it.

eTrigue is quick to master, and very flexible for more complex campaigns. The ROI reporting is pretty cool, and gives us data even if our sales team does not.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
I dont have any complaints. The previous reporting was harder to use, though the new reporting is very fast, has time based measurements for comparison, and has some pretty advanced features that are easy to test theories, and change campaign messaging based on results.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
They genuinely care about our success. The support team is available by phone, and does not charge for premium support. We are able to get a new account setup within 2 - 4 days, and are running campaigns within a week. We have seen new features released regularly, and are excited about some new functionality being added. I recommend for anyone that wants to generate results quickly and needs to add people to their team and ramp up without requiring lots of training.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
We paid for eTrigue 5x with our first deal a week after implementing. The ROI is very high. We can have new employees setting up campaigns and running in their first week. We launch about 3 campaigns per week, and dont need a dedicated team. We can usually setup a landing page, email, and follow on assets within a couple hours. Then test the campaign and have it live within 20 minutes. One thing that has helped us tremenously is that we dont have to create all of the emails and asssets before we start a campaign. With other tools we had to create all of the assets first, before we could build the campaign. In eTrigue, we can create the who campaign flow, and add assets as they are completed. We can even start the campaign when only the first asset is completed. This enables us to launch campaigns sooner and not lose time waiting for the asset to be completed. Obviously this has been created by marketing people who know that customers change their minds yet the deadline remains the same.

If you understand the concepts behind marketing and a clear idea of your goals, you can get some serious campaigns and lead flow going quickly.

all_reviews.review_title: eTrigue Demand Center delivers the leads to ramp revenue.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
For CRM systems, there are 5 key "must haves" for cost-effective lead generation:

1) Fast and well supported implementation and training. Time to effective operation, 2 weeks maximum

2) Excellent customer service and responsiveness to client requests. The eTrigue support staff are knowledgeable and available to assure client success.

3) Intuitive operation.  eTrigue Demand Center is a robust product spawned from detailed marketing requirements and field tested for many years across companies of all sizes.

4) Robust feature set. Demand Center was not conceived in a developers head but rather it has evolved by market use and demand; thus it fits the real-life needs of the marketing department objectives.

5) Annual return-on-investment within the initial 90 days of operation. Investment small or large in marketing systems must clearly demonstrate a near term ROI. My measure is annual cost must be realized with the first 90 days of operation. Demand Center delivers this ROI.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
In the past, eTrigue Demand Center was not available in a version well suited to small business budgets.  However, this is no longer true.   In fact, I have implemented Demand Center in a number of small client companies who are now reaping the benefits that mid through Enterprise companies have enjoyed for years.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
It is a great product and stands above the competition.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a marketing and business consultant it is my responsibility to work with companies to realize optimal operational and ROI benefit from their marketing and sales (CRM, SFA, etc.) system selections.   Frequently, the client's primary objective is to  implement and ramp lead generation to drive revenue growth.  I have worked with a variety of the CRM systems in the market and, over the years, I have honed my list of "must haves" for any system I recommend to a client.  (see my "must haves" list).

It is critical to my reputation as a consultant that my clients are successful using the systems that I recommend.  I can bet on success and client satisfaction with eTrigue

all_reviews.review_title: eTrigue is the best marketing automation tool available
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
Email campaigns are now easy. We have several newsletter and event campaigns setup that we modify (add to - in the case of newsletters) or clone (for webinars). We don't have to start from scratch each time, and can see the statistics (opens, visits, opt-outs..) for the campaign right in the campaign window.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
The alerts require that you build logic to narrow down specific search criteria for each alert, assign named users and set the conditions for each alert.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
Use Demand Center and stay away from the "all-in-one" marketing suites if you're looking for real marketing automation.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were not getting enough information from campaigns and we were not able to see how much time was spent on pages from our previous system.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
Other SaaS providers have multiple criteria to evaluate in order to come up with your subscription price. With eTrigue it is solely based on the number of prospects in the system.  Which works well for us who are in the process of expanding our Sales and Marketing systems, and didn't appreciate our sales system vendor bumping up the price for every new way we found to use the system.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
I would have liked the ability to perform math based on custom number fields.  For example, if I had two different number fields to store the number of times we sold Product A to a prospect, and the second stored the number of times we sold product B to a customer, then it would be helpful to be able to sum these together, and do something after a cretin threshold is meet. While there is comparison operations on custom number fields, it's too static for me.

What problems is eTrigue solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to reach a very targeted B2B customer, and more and more so every day with easy prospect importing, and capturing of new prospects through eTrigue enabled web forms.  With real time lead alerts, and eTrigue progressive forms to better elicit customer need, we are realizing our website can be a world wide sales floor.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eTrigue?
Not as complex as the higher cost marketing automation tools.  Easy to use and fully integrated with Salesforce.  Great tool for the small to mid market companies that do not have the money to spend on top dollar applications.

What do you dislike about eTrigue?
It does not come with all the bells that Eloqua, Marketo, and such come with.  Would like to see some more basic templates for mass emails.  Otherwise a good product.

Recommendations to others considering eTrigue:
If you are a small or mid market company sending hundreds, not thousands of emails on a monthly basis, this is the tool for you.
